text:
Are you leaving for the weekend? Happy Friday gives you a menu from Autogrill (photo)
01 Nov 2019, 11:20 by Vincenzo Ronca
How every Friday the appointment with Vodafone's Happy Friday returns, an occasion when the red operator offers gifts and discounts to his customers registered with the Vodafone Happy loyalty program.
Today, November 1, Vodafone offers its customers a gift suitable for those traveling on the motorway: Happy Friday in fact provides a coupon code to receive a sandwich menu or a slice of pizza with a free drink against the purchase of a menu identical, at Autogrill sales points. The coupon code can be used until November 15th.
As usual, the Happy Friday gift can be redeemed until midnight today, November 1, through the special section of the MyVodafone app.



1 ðŸ“· go to the photo gallery
